translations: v.用带子束紧；交织在一起；抽打（lace 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: He was sitting on the bed lacing up his shoes.
See runnersworld.com/lacing for our best suggestions.
sentences.translation: 你可以浏览网页runnersworld.com/lacing，看看我们的最佳建议。

sentences.sentence: As the person was wearing and lacing it, some of the eyelets had been torn and repaired.
sentences.translation: 由于某人穿过而且鞋带系得较紧，一些眼孔已被撕裂并修补过。
